thread.title: TV | Live Ford Super Sunday
thread.title_full: TV | Live Ford Super Sunday - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: TV | Live Ford Super Sunday
text: What a day of sport. You'll have to decide where your allegiance lies when it comes to football and rugby, as the Liverpool vs Southampton game in Anfield at 4.15pm clashes with the world cup semi final, but you'll still have time to catch the two earlier kick-offs today. The Tyne-Wear derby starts at 12.00pm as Sunderland host Newcastle, with both sides looking to cover up bad starts to their seasons with a win over their local rivals, but that's not the only derby of the day. City host United in the Manchester derby at 2.05pm, as they look to land first place after 10 games of the season, while United know a win, despite a stuttering start, will place them ahead of the league favourites.
